headline: Russia business deals muddy GOP US Senate primary in Ohio

COLUMBUS (AP) — Several Republicans competing for the party’s nomination to run for U.S. Senate in Ohio are facing scrutiny for their ties to Russia as the country intensifies its war against Ukraine.
